TrcFtcLib.ftclib

Class FtcPixyCam1

  • java.lang.Object
    • TrcCommonLib.trclib.TrcPixyCam1
      • TrcFtcLib.ftclib.FtcPixyCam1

  • public class FtcPixyCam1
extends TrcPixyCam1
    This class implements a platform dependent pixy camera 1 that is connected to an I2C bus. It provides access to the last detected objects reported by the pixy camera asynchronously.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class TrcCommonLib.trclib.TrcPixyCam1

        TrcPixyCam1.ObjectBlock, TrcPixyCam1.RequestId

        instanceName - specifies the instance name.
        devAddress - specifies the I2C address of the device.
